title: Did Hillary Clinton repeal its tax code by "donating" $1 million to itself through the Clinton Foundation?
subtitle: The accusations that Hillary Clinton surveyed her pockets by deducting charitable donations to the Clinton Foundation appear to be unfounded.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Of the $1,042,000 in charitable donations, Hillary Clinton deducted from its tax revenues for 2015, $1 million went into its own pocket through contributions to the Clinton Foundation.
